item.title: Do you agree with Hardt and Negri’s contention that we now live in the age of Empire?
item.description: I wrote this essay in my third-year of my BA Politics, back in 2008. The module was Discourse, Power, Politics, taught by Dr Saul Newman My reading of Hardt and Negri’s Empire1 has taken me on a personal political journey. The text has provoked a critical examination of my own politics, bringing about a new consciousness of subject and sovereignty, of agency in a hyperglobalised world and of resistance to global capital.
